policies.type: Children and information about extra beds
policies.text: Fee for an extra bed: 25.00 USD per night.,The number of extra beds depends on the room category. You must take a look at the information about the size of the selected room.
A deposit of 300.00 USD per stay will be required by bank transfer upon arrival to cover any potential damages.
Pets are allowed for an additional fee. Price of accommodation: 150.00 USD per stay.
Information about the type of meals included in the price is indicated in the rate details.

policies.text: Fee for an extra bed: 25.00 USD per night.,The number of extra beds depends on the room category. You must take a look at the information about the size of the selected room.
A deposit of 300.00 USD per stay will be required by bank transfer upon arrival to cover any potential damages.
Pets are allowed for an additional fee. Price of accommodation: 150.00 USD per stay.
